df2 = df.withColumn("Amount", df.Amount.cast("float"))
df2.printSchema()
df2.show()

df3 = sqlContext.sql("SELECT Supplier, SUM(CAST(Amount AS FLOAT)) as Tot_Amount FROM test_csv GROUP BY Supplier ORDER BY SUM(CAST(Amount AS FLOAT)) DESC")
df3.printSchema()
df3.show()
